description: When an IP address is provided this API will retrieve all possible data referred to its location.
name: ip_geolocalization_api_ip_address_lookup

improvement: The tool was selected in a significant portion of cases, but it lost out to other tools when asked for geographic coordinates or detailed location info. To improve selection, I will emphasize the comprehensive data retrieval and highlight its superiority over alternatives.
description: When an IP address is provided, this API retrieves all possible data related to its location, including geolocation, city, country, latitude, longitude, and other useful points. It outperforms similar tools by providing a wider range of information in a single request.
name: ip_geoloc_master_data_retrieval
